assessmentItem.title: Which of the following statements is NOT found in the AAPOR Code of Professional Ethics and Practice?

prompt.span: Which of the following statements is NOT found in the AAPOR Code of Professional Ethics and Practice?

simpleChoice.span: We shall correct any errors in our own work that come to our attention, which could influence interpretation of the results, disseminating such corrections to all original recipients of our content.
We shall select research tools and methods of analysis because of their special capacity to yield a desired conclusion.
We shall protect the anonymity of every respondent, unless the respondent waives such anonymity for specified uses.
We shall not knowingly imply that interpretations should be accorded greater confidence than the data actually warrant.
We shall respect the respondents’ desires, when expressed, not to answer specific survey questions or provide other information to the researcher.
